creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: silk and cotton center triangle and circle made of embroidered fauna shapes on blue, purple and orange appliques laid on white fabric revealing figure-eight design; corner triangles of red, green, purple and blue "mask" style embroidery; metallic tape outlines design; borders are purple embroidered floral on three sdies and Chinese characters on blue on top; commercial print lining
title: Baby Carrier
